video_prompt: Girl's hair subtly sways. Her eyes subtly shift. Her expression transitions from neutral to a faint smile. Hand gestures slightly, then tucks into pocket. Jacket subtly slides on shoulders. Graffiti elements subtly change, appearing and fading on the wall, creating a dynamic background.
image_prompt: Anime girl with dark flowing hair and intense green eyes, fair skin, small nose, pink lips, faint blush, wearing a dark gray midriff tank top and light jacket draped over shoulders, blue distressed denim shorts. Standing angled left, looking at viewer. White brick wall with vibrant graffiti in background. Vertical illustration, contemporary urban style.
refined_video_prompt: Hair gently sways. Eyes subtly shift. Expression morphs from neutral to a faint smile. A hand gestures, then tucks into a pocket. The jacket subtly slides on shoulders. On the wall, graffiti elements dynamically appear and fade.
